title: Visegr치d Group
summary: The Visegr치d Group, Visegr치d Four, V4, or European Quartet, is a cultural and political alliance of four countries of Central Europe[4] (Czech Republic, Hungary, Poland and Slovakia), all of which are members of the EU and of NATO, to advance co-operation in military, cultural, economic and energy matters with one another and to further their integration to the EU.[5]
